main event: Multiple pilots in Louisville, KY sighted an unidentified object maintaining a constant heading for about 5 minutes.
interesting points: The object was reported to maintain a constant heading for about 5 minutes, indicating controlled movement.
It was described as resembling a red-tinged star but with a size that was not determined.
The object was reported to have a speed well over 100 miles per hour and no visible trail or exhaust.
The sighting occurred at an approximate altitude of 5000 feet, and there were no physical evidence or known aircraft interceptions in the area.
The witnesses were identified as reliable and experienced pilots with no known explanation for the sighting.
sighted object: unidentified object maintaining a constant heading
